title: _SET_VEHICLE_USE_HORN_BUTTON_FOR_NITROUS
content:
0x1980F68872CC2C3D// SetVehicleUseHornButtonForNitrous
void _SET_VEHICLE_USE_HORN_BUTTON_FOR_NITROUS(Vehicle vehicle, BOOL bToggle);Parameters:vehicle: The vehicle where this setting will be applied.bToggle: If set to true, the horn button will activate the nitrous system; if false, it will not.NativeDB Introduced: v3095Enables or disables the use of the vehicle's horn button for activating the nitrous system.Examples:LuaJavaScriptC#-- Retrieve the player ped
local playerPed = PlayerPedId()

-- Retrieve the vehicle the player is currently in. 
local vehicle = GetVehiclePedIsIn(playerPed, false)

-- Check if the vehicle exists in the game world.
if vehicle == 0 then return end

-- Enable activating nitrous in the vehicle using the horn button.
SetVehicleUseHornButtonForNitrous(vehicle, true)
codeBlocks:
local vehicle = GetVehiclePedIsIn(PlayerPedId(), false)
-- Example usage for _SET_VEHICLE_USE_HORN_BUTTON_FOR_NITROUS
_etVehicleUseHornButtonForNitrous(vehicle, true)
